{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Filmmaking {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Filmmaking Filmmaking (or, in any context, film production ) is the process by which a film is made. Filmmaking involves a number of complex and discrete stages including an initial story, idea, or commission, through screenwriting, casting, shooting, sound recording and pre-production, editing, and screening the finished product before an audience that may result in a film release and an exhibition. Filmmaking takes place in many places around the world in a range of economic, social, and political contexts, and using a variety of technologies and cinematic techniques. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Filmmaking)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
